Articles.Content: Is it possible to have IVA view without having crew? If yes how can it be done, if no, then how hard would it be to create using plugin?
So for probes and the like? I'm sure something similar to those fixed camera mods would be possible but it wouldn't be a proper IVA.
You could make a IVA and add a single Kerbal as Camera and put something infront of him so the camera won't view his face.
